data.message: Recyclable isn't the same as recycled - if new oil is going into making these bottles that's still a problem. Are these bottles going to be made from 100% recycled plastic as well?

replies.message: Hi Tabitha, currently we use 25% recycled plastic and have committed to doubling the amount to 50% by 2020. We’d like to use more but there’s not enough recycled plastic in the UK at the moment, we need more bottles to be recycled. This is why as part of our strategy we will be seeking reform of the recycling system in the UK to improve recovery and recycling rates.
